help-file.title: IOUN STONES
help-file.content:
Ioun stones are magical stones that orbit around the wearer's head when worn. Each of these mystical stones are one-of-a-kind and thereby artifacts by nature, but they can be worn with other types of artifacts. No ioun stone is alike, and they all bestow different powers.
For a list of iouns, type "arti ioun".
